column4: Help please ! Natty, fresh install, system freezes : either black screen (eg. while switching users), or just frozen screen (eg. while playing full screen video). In all cases, magic keys have no effects, network is down (no more ssh, nor ping). Any hint or idea please ?
did you recently update your system and restart during the course that it was installing?
i had that problem when i canceled the install before it finished, computer was going apesh*t on me.
